bio.about: Software Engineer with a can-do attitude and experience in building ES applications while reaching maximum application performance. Supportive and motivated team player, consistently sharing ideas on how to improve project process and efficiency. Proficient in building isomorphic applications and Progressive Web Apps.

highlights: Keep breaking code and moving teams towards tomorrow's goal
Led Nike Member Access Admin application foundation and creation
Separated client from business logic and developed Node & GraphQL middle layer to communicate with multiple AWS webservices
Provided e2e testing using Cypress and automated CI/CD process using Jenkins
Contributed to Nike Reusable Component Library
Application successfully launched for China
Led Nike Member Access Admin application foundation and creation
Seperated client from business logic and developed Node & GraphQL middle layer to communicate with multiple AWS webservices
Provided e2e testing using Cypress and automated CI/CD process using Jenkins
Contributed to Nike Reusable Component Library
Application succesfully launched for China
Developed and maintained React PWA CLI with custom features for multiple teams to use
Centralized Webpack configuration used by various applications
Led* (spearheaded) engineering CSS design system pattern used by multiple teams (PostCSS + ITCSS/OOCSS/BEM)
Led* engineering and building Reusable React Components Library used by multiple teams
Contributed to Platform CLI to be able aggregate multiple React or Angular independent applications, share and update state
Provided e2e testing using Selenium and automated CI/CD process using Bamboo
Consultant on intricacies of implementing features and design across multiple teams
Created multiple registration sites for various companies such as, HIMSS, ASA and CES, and used by 12,000+ registrants.
Designed custom administrative front-ends for clients by using Javascript frameworks such as React.
Utilized responsive design to create mobile-first websites with the help of Bootstrap and Foundation.
Integrated analytic software to ensure clients have up-to-date information about the status of their trade shows
Provided digital media support for clients and publishers
Build JS modules for Scandinavian and UK publishers to showcase Rich Media banners correctly
Part of the team that made Burberry Billboard run on Yahoo sites all around Europe, before format was certified
